title: Indian Crypto Exchange CoinSwitch Cuts Support Team, Citing Market Doldrums
description: The crypto investment platform laid off 44 people, or nearly 7% of its employees, about three weeks ago.

title: Genesis, Digital Currency Group Reach In-Principle Agreement to Settle Creditors' Claims
description: While the agreement could potentially lead to a fair recovery for creditors, Genesis’ former partner Gemini has yet to support it.

title: Genesis vows 70-90% returns for creditors in new deal
description: In a significant development within the cryptocurrency industry, Digital Currency Group (DCG), a prominent venture capital firm deeply entrenched in the crypto landscape, has made significant strides toward resolving the financial troubles of its crypto lending subsidiary, Genesis. title: Shiba Inu Developer Says Layer-2 Protocol Shibarium Is Live and Ready for Prime Time
description:
Pseudonymous memecoin developer Shytoshi Kusama says Shiba Inu’s (SHIB) scaling solution Shibarium is “live and operating well.” In a new blog post, Kusama says that “Shibarium is ready for prime time” after technical issues blamed on a “massive influx” of users cropped up following its official launch earlier this month.
